title: Fix DB reuse
message:
Fix DB reuse

DB is now reused in fragments that are located in DB providing contexts.

title: Giant leap of faith
message:
Giant leap of faith

Massive commit with reworked database and connection to the new API. To
use the database via object, call `locateDb()` or delegate a value to
`lazyLocateDb()`. To use database via mixin, derive from interface
`HasDb` and override `db` via constructor arg, statically to
`locateDb()` or delegate to `lazyLocateDb()`.

The database also contains typed joiners. To go from `Dealer` to their
thumbnail, use `dealer[toThumbnail]` in a mixin instance or
`dealer[db.toThumbnail]` when using an object.

title: Fix inference bug
message:
Fix inference bug

Kotlin tries to concatenate a starting block to the previous method call, this is not wanted in the update service and caused
a typing problem for the constructor. We do get around this by just using a different pattern to instantiate the intents

title: Refactor the UI and code
message:
Refactor the UI and code

The database interface has been refactored, including utility methods. The image service now handles null-images. APIs for both content fragments and the root activity were introduced. A new root activity deals with content management. Fragments for viewing list of event and info, as well as their details were created. View obtaining delegators have been created for fragments. Missing extensions were implemented. The layout structure has been changed to conform to the new fragment based approach. Refactorings to the layout itself is pending.

title: Replace old update mechanism
message:
Replace old update mechanism

The previous iteration of the update system relied on a highly complicated system of intents and results. The new one is rather simple. Besides that, cache invalidation was implemented, so that multiple instances of the `Database` can be used across the application without risking invalid results on different ends. A set of refactorings was performed.

title: Wholly implemented EventActivity. It's now rendering times and organizers
message: Wholly implemented EventActivity. It's now rendering times and organizers

title: We're now showing data in event activity
message: We're now showing data in event activity

title: Moved driver.init up to superclass
message: Moved driver.init up to superclass

title: Merge remote-tracking branch 'origin/master'
message: Merge remote-tracking branch 'origin/master'

title: Added EventActivity.
message:
Added EventActivity.

Currently the eventactivity itself crashes on init, since it's trying to load the toolbar, need to find a way to import the toolbar in the activity_event XML

title: Implement DB indexing
message:
Implement DB indexing

Database elements are identified by an ID. Thereby they are a map instead of a list. The surrounding structures are reconsolidated to accomodate the new system.

title: Implement a logger
message:
Implement a logger

The logging service inlines a conditional function execution that logs to a file and the Android logging system. The latter does for some reason not show up in the LogCat view, but the file contains all the appropriate messages.

title: Replace image Id stub
message:
Replace image Id stub

The images of the events have been set with a stub. This behavior is now replaced, since an actual image is assigned.

title: Migrate to AUIL
message:
Migrate to AUIL

Since Volley does only the basics of image caching, Android Universal Image Loader was introduced. Now, the images are cached between application runs, tested with airplane mode.

title: Use volley images and refactor
message:
Use volley images and refactor

Volley provides mechanisms to load images for Android UI controls. These have been tested to a small degree. A number of refactorings were performed, reordering the services, functions, and utilities by concern.

title: Use Volley and remove Roboguice
message:
Use Volley and remove Roboguice

Roboguice has not been used and not proven useful for the addressed domain, therefore it was removed. Instead of the legacy HTTP API, volley is now introduced. A fix in the swagger code generator now covers string escaping. The app has been tested from cache-free launch and with a delta application, the prior yielded a full update, where the latter had no transmissions due to up-to-date status.

title: Add simple error handling
message:
Add simple error handling

The database update may fail on a multitude of levels. They are abstracted into a success status that is passed to the database callbacks. Right now, only boolean is used. There is probably no further use -- beyond debugging -- for the actual exceptions.

title: Subclassed launch screen to base activity for navigation related functions
message: Subclassed launch screen to base activity for navigation related functions

title: Stopped tracking project files
message: Stopped tracking project files

title: Push remaining files
message:
Push remaining files

Some of the file have not been pushed because of a malfunctioning git setup, these should be added in this commit

title: Rewrite database and create synchronization
message:
Rewrite database and create synchronization

The old database implementation was too large to maintain, a new, smaller version is implemented and a set of abstractions is introduced. The background service is retrieving the data in the background and feeding it to the database. There are some issues with the fault tolerance in input and output, which need to be addressed.

title: Extract a service for data download
message:
Extract a service for data download

Downloading the events, days, tracks etc. needs to be performed on a non-UI thread. Instead of quick-fixing using threads, an intent service is implemented. The data is stored in a Json sequence, which provides map-like functionality. Some utilities have been created on the way.

title: Comment the code
message:
Comment the code

Comments on the behaviour of the code are added, to help in understanding the sandbox code going on in onCreate of the Launch screen activity.

title: Fix time calculation
message:
Fix time calculation

Time calculation was based on last years first date. Hardcoded for testing

title: Add time calculations to App
message:
Add time calculations to App

Jodatime is used for time calculations. In addition, Kotlin files are moved appropriately and some designs were redone. Added the feature of "Days until con".

title: Adapt events in a recycler
message:
Adapt events in a recycler

Fragments are populated from the events list and displayed in a recycler. This is however static data. It also needs to be mapped to the user-related database, so that favorites, notes and such can be stored apart from global data.

title: Patch Swagger generator
message:
Patch Swagger generator

The code generator does not utilize the feature for inheritance. A new version is compiled from the current head of the git repositories master branch. Now, erroneous reconfiguration of Gson is not required. No fields are duplicated. Adjustments to the build script and the gradle configuration to speed up launch were added.

title: Setup Roboguice initialization
message:
Setup Roboguice initialization

Kotlin now configured for Roboguice, module was added and launcher derived from the Roboguice implementation. The argument to the card is now passed in the bundle, since the update layout method tried to invoke functionality that was not initialzied yet.

title: Switch to swaggers Android template
message:
Switch to swaggers Android template

The Java template generates too large bindings, the android template is more compatible but requires adjustments to the dependencies and the build script. Gradle The generated code exposes properties that GSON can't handle. The problem is patched in the GsonConfiguration: properties exposed by parent classes are skipped. Events are in this version successfully listed on the main screen (Tested on Huawei ALE-L21).
